queries.query:
from(bucket: "SMARTENERGY")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "adc_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy_kWh" or r["_field"] == "power_W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "2" or r["channel"] == "4" or r["channel"] == "6")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SMARTENERGY")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "adc_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "scaled_value" or r["_field"] == "raw_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "2" or r["channel"] == "4" or r["channel"] == "6")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
